hero.title: Software Developer - Mobile & Backend
hero.aboutMe: Accomplished Software Developer experienced in building high-performance mobile applications and robust backend systems. Skilled in designing and developing scalable, cloud-ready solutions using modern architectures and best practices. Proven ability to deliver reliable, user-focused products across the full development lifecycle, with deep expertise in mobile app development, API design, distributed systems, and enterprise-grade backend services. Known for driving innovation, improving system efficiency, and collaborating effectively in agile environments to deliver impactful, long-lasting technology solutions.

skill.title: My Technical Arsenal
skill.subtitle: A collection of technologies I'm proficient in, constantly learning and adapting to the ever-evolving digital landscape. From front-end frameworks to back-end languages, these are the tools I use to build robust and beautiful applications.

experience.title: My Professional Journey
experience.subtitle:
Tracing my career path through impactful roles and innovative
projects that shaped my expertise

items.title: Software Programmer
description: Designed and developed Android applications used by internal teams to support operational workflows and improve process efficiency.
Evaluated and integrated suitable open-source components from GitHub to improve feature implementation and reduce development time.
Implemented clean architecture patterns (e.g., MVVM) to ensure maintainability and testability of codebases.
Maintained existing applications by delivering updates, refactoring legacy components, and improving system stability.
Performed debugging, profiling, and optimization to enhance app reliability and performance.

items.title: Software Developer
items.company: Selfypage Developers Pvt Ltd, Bengaluru, India.
description: Served as a core team member involved in designing, architecting, and developing company software applications delivered in a SaaS model.
Developed backend modules in Java, implementing business rules and workflow logic using Spring Boot.
Designed and built REST-based microservices using Spring Boot to support scalable and modular application architecture.
Utilized Java Collections API for efficient handling, processing, and transfer of data across business layers and UI components.
Implemented data persistence and connectivity with MongoDB using the Morphia Java driver.
Deployed microservices on AWS EC2 instances and secured service access through AWS API Gateway.
Developed Android applications as front-end solutions using Kotlin and Jetpack components.

items.title: Software Developer- Backend
items.company: Motocruizer Technologies India Pvt Ltd, Bengaluru, India.
description: Developed RESTful web services using Spring Boot and a microservices architecture for a mobility product serving over 500K users.
Leveraged AWS services for deploying, managing, and exposing backend APIs in a scalable environment.
Integrated an open-source GPS tracking system to monitor, manage, and collect data from IoT-enabled electric cycles.
Utilized Jenkins to support continuous integration and streamlined build pipelines.
Resolved bugs and performance issues to enhance overall product stability and user experience.

items.title: Software Engineer- Android
items.company: Capulus Technologies Pvt Ltd, Chickmagaluru, India.
description: Engineered end-to-end native Android applications using Java and Kotlin.
Contributed to architectural planning and technical design decisions throughout the project lifecycle.
Implemented MVP architecture and utilized ORMLite and Room for efficient local data persistence.
Integrated networking libraries such as Volley and Retrofit for API communication.
Collaborated with the design team to deliver high-quality UI/UX aligned with product requirements.
Managed debug and release builds, including preparing and publishing applications to the Google Play Store.
Integrated Firebase Crashlytics and analytics tools to monitor performance, identify issues, and drive app stability improvements.
